message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.NI

The paper deals with detecting covert cryptomining, which is a form of cybercrime. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also utilizes machine learning techniques, which suggests that it could belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) or cs.SE (Software Engineering). The use of Hardware Performance Counters (HPC) indicates that it could also belong to cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) or cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture).
